graph_title: Investments in energy efficiency as a proportion of GDP and the amount of foreign direct investment in financial transfer for infrastructure and technology to sustainable development services
indicator_name: Investments in energy efficiency as a proportion of GDP and the amount of foreign direct investment in financial transfer for infrastructure and technology to sustainable development services
target_name: Entro il 2030, espandere l'infrastruttura e aggiornare la tecnologia per la fornitura di servizi energetici moderni e sostenibili per tutti i paesi in via di sviluppo, in particolare per i paesi meno sviluppati, i piccoli Stati insulari, e per i paesi in via di sviluppo senza sbocco sul mare, in accordo con i loro rispettivi programmi di sostegno
indicator_name_national: Investments in energy efficiency as a proportion of GDP and the amount of foreign direct investment in financial transfer for infrastructure and technology to sustainable development services
